title: Wanted to win for people of India, says FC Goa coach Juan Ferrando
description: Margao, Apr 27 (PTI) FC Goa head coach Juan Ferrando is heartbroken after his team conceded a last-minute equaliser in its AFC Champions League match against Al Rayyan, saying the side wanted to win for the people of India who are battling a deadly second wave of COVID-19 pandemic.
